arts.ttl: Serie A Week 3 official line-ups: Hellas Verona vs. Cremonese
arts.sum: Jamie Vardy starts among the substitutes, but could be in line to make his Serie...

Verona will be hoping to get their season on track with the visit of Cremonese. Verona have drawn one and lost one of their opening two games. Cremonese have started the season in spectacular fashion...
